md:
giải nghĩa từ "altar" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Altar (noun)
	+ Meaning: A table or structure used for performing religious rituals or ceremonies.
	+ Vietnamese: Bàn thờ, bàn tế lễ
	+ Example sentence: The priest stood at the altar, preparing for the sacred ceremony.
	+ Related words: shrine, temple, worship, ritual, ceremony.

* Altar (verb)
	+ Meaning: To change or modify something, especially in a subtle or slight way.
	+ Vietnamese: Đổi, thay đổi
	+ Example sentence: The artist altered the painting to make it more vibrant.
	+ Related words: modify, change, adjust, revise, transform.

Note: The verb form of "altar" is less common and may not be recognized by all dictionaries or language resources. The noun form is more widely used and recognized.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "altar" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Altar (noun)

    • Meaning: A table or structure used for performing religious rituals or ceremonies.
    • Vietnamese: Bàn thờ, bàn tế lễ
    • Example sentence: The priest stood at the altar, preparing for the sacred ceremony.
    • Related words: shrine, temple, worship, ritual, ceremony.

  • Altar (verb)

    • Meaning: To change or modify something, especially in a subtle or slight way.
    • Vietnamese: Đổi, thay đổi
    • Example sentence: The artist altered the painting to make it more vibrant.
    • Related words: modify, change, adjust, revise, transform.

Note: The verb form of "altar" is less common and may not be recognized by all dictionaries or language resources. The noun form is more widely used and recognized.
